title: Writing: making meaning
creator_credit: Bob Scarfe and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Looks at the process of teaching children to write in the postprimary school by focusing on teaching methods of three teachers. Stresses that writing for meaning comes first and mechanics of writing second. Narrated by Diane O’Connor.
